ErrorBoundary.Title: Oops! Something went wrong :(
ErrorBoundary.Subtitle: Sorry, the application encountered an unexpected error. We would greatly appreciate your help in improving it.

Feedback.Title: Help Us Improve
Feedback.Subtitle: Please choose one of the following methods to report this error. Your feedback will help us quickly resolve the issue.

GitHub.Title: Method 1: GitHub Issue
GitHub.Subtitle: Create an Issue in our GitHub repository, making it easier for us to track and fix the problem.
GitHub.Tooltip: Tip: Creating an Issue will automatically include error information and stack trace, and supports follow-up discussion and updates.

Email.Title: Method 2: Email Feedback
Email.Subtitle: Send us an error report via email, suitable for users unfamiliar with GitHub.
Email.Tooltip: Tip: Email reports are suitable for detailed descriptions of problems and screenshots, but responses may not be as timely as GitHub.

Actions.Title: You can also try the following actions:
